title: PHPmysqli get_connection_stats()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPmysqli get_connection_stats()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return stats about the client connection:
<?php
$con = mysqli_connect("localhost","my_user","my_password","my_db");
print_r(mysqli_get_connection_stats($con));
?>
Definition and Usage
The mysqli_get_connection_stats() function returns statistics about the client connection.
Syntax
Object oriented style:
$mysqli -> 
  get_connection_stats()
Procedural style:
mysqli_get_connection_stats(
connection
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
connection
Required. Specifies the MySQL connection to use
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns an array with connection stats on success. FALSE on failure
PHP Version:
5.3+

+1
